Feature Relevance Intervals
  • Docs »
  • Overview

Overview¶

FRI is a Python 3 package for analytical feature selection purposes. It allows superior feature selection in the sense that all important features are conserved. At the moment we support multiple linear models for solving Classification, Regression and Ordinal Regression Problems. We also support LUPI paradigm where at learning time, privileged information is available.

Check out the Quick Start Guide for a practical introduction. For theoretical explanations look at the Background or read the References for the long version.

The source code can be found at GitHub. If you have any problems or suggestions open an issue!

Installation¶

FRI is available on PyPI and can be installed via pip:

pip install fri

All dependencies should be installed automatically if not already present.
